trans-unit.target:
Hej %partnerFirstName%,

A user with email %recruiterEmail% has just registered as a recruiter. You are required to approve his registration in order for him to view the vacancies.
A new recruiter has to be approved

trans-unit.source:
Dear %firstName%,

your registration request was submitted for approval. Once approved you will be able to use all recruiter functions on the Transport Talent platform.

Best Regards,
Your Transpsort Talent Team
trans-unit.target:

your registration request was submitted for approval. Once approved you will be able to use all recruiter functions on the Transport Talent platform.

trans-unit.source: Your registration to become a recruiter on the platform will have to be confirmed by Transport Talent.
trans-unit.target: Your registration to become a recruiter on the platform will have to be confirmed by Transport Talent.

Dear %partnerFirstName%,

the recruiter with email %recruiterEmail% was successfully approved by you and can now browse jobs and refer candidates.

trans-unit.source:
Dear %firstName%,
Your registration request was approved by %partnerFirstName% %partnerLastName%. You now have access to use all recruiter functions of the Transport Talent platform.
Best Regards,
Your Transport Talent Team
